scripts.prod: npm run build && db-migrate up --env prod && node ./dist/server.js
scripts.prod:windows: npm run build:windows && db-migrate up --env prod && node ./dist/server.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ || true && db-migrate reset --env dev || true && db-migrate reset --env prod || true
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp .npmrc dist/.npmrc && cd dist && zip -r Archive.zip .&& ls -a && cd ..
scripts.build-original: npm run clean && npx tsc && cp -rf src/config dist/config && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build:windows: npm run clean && npx tsc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp .npmrc dist/.npmrc && cd dist && 7z a Archive.zip -r . && cd ..
scripts.build:windows-original: npm run clean && npx tsc && cp -rf src/config dist/config && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && 7z a Archive.zip -r . && cd ..
scripts.test: ENV=dev npm run build && db-migrate up --env test && npm run jasmine && db-migrate reset --env test
